case.title: Johnny Depp lookalike seeks cute, kinky girl with poor eyesight... - m4w - 30 (London)
case.text:
Hello there,
So, though so I'm no Johnny Depp, I'm certainly no Johnny Vegas either. In fact, I'd say I'm quick-witted, smarter than the average, happy to be doing a job I love and quite easy on the eye, too (even if I do say so myself)
And hopefully you're all of the above and, like me, curious about this whole online adventure thing and keen to enjoy a little fun without having the time or inclination for a 'proper relationship'. And bonus points if you're more a pub than a club, Converse than heels, Morrissey than Muirs kind of girl, and if you're all of the above and the proud owner of a lingerie collection that would make Dita green with envy, then consider my boxes well and truly ticked...
So, what say you?
